movies.title: Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children
movies.plot: Two years after the events in "Final Fantasy VII", a disease called 'Seikon-Shoukougun', or 'Geostigma', is spreading through the planet. This disease is believed to have been caused by the body fighting off foreign material that invaded the body two years earlier, at the end of "Final Fantasy VII". Guilt-ridden and haunted by his past, ex-SOLDIER Cloud Strife has decided to live a secluded, solitary life away from his friends while maintaining "Strife's Delivery Service", whose headquarters is located in Tifa Lockheart's bar, the Seventh Heaven. Tifa's bar serves as an orphanage for children stricken with Geostigma. Here, Tifa keeps an eye on Barret's six-year-old daughter, Marlene, while Barret searches the planet for an alternative energy source to the Planet's energy, Mako. One day, Cloud receives a phone call from the former Shinra, Inc. president, Rufus, asking him for protection from a mysterious man named Kadaj. Kadaj, in the meantime, along with his brothers Loz and Yazoo, ...
movies.simplePlot: An ex-mercenary is forced out of isolation when three mysterious men kidnap and brainwash the city's children afflicted with the Geostigma disease.

biography.bio: Takahiro Sakurai was born on June 13, 1974 in Okazaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Polar Bear's Café (2012) and D.Gray-man (2006).
biography.name: Takahiro Sakurai

biography.bio: Ayumi Ito was active as a child model. In 1993, she made her film debut in Mizu no tabibito: Samurai kizzu (1993). Her distinctive style then led to her superb acting in the 1996 feature, Swallowtail Butterfly (1996). She received a Best New Actress Award and Best Supporting Actress Award from the Japanese Academy Awards for this role. She also received the Best New Actress Award from the Takasaki Film Festival.
biography.name: Ayumi Itô

biography.bio: Shôtarô Morikubo was born on February 25, 1974 in Hachioji, Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and Naruto (2002). He was previously married to Yu Asakawa.
biography.name: Shôtarô Morikubo

biography.bio: Maaya Sakamoto was born on March 31, 1980 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Ghost in the Shell (1995) and Ouran High School Host Club (2006). She has been married to Ken'ichi Suzumura since August 8, 2011.
biography.name: Maaya Sakamoto

biography.bio: Keiji Fujiwara was born on October 5, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Eureka Seven (2005) and Tokumei Sentai Go-Busters (2012).
biography.name: Keiji Fujiwara

biography.bio: Taiten Kusunoki was born on March 18, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan as Daisuke Fukuda. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Tiger & Bunny (2011) and Gekijouban Tiger & Bunny: The Beginning (2012).
biography.name: Taiten Kusunoki

biography.bio: Yûji Kishi was born on September 28, 1970 in Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and manager, known for Gekisou Sentai Carranger (1996), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and Appleseed Ex Machina (2007). He was previously married to Mika Kikuchi.
biography.name: Yûji Kishi

biography.bio: Kenji Nomura was born on July 23, 1970 in Okayama, Japan. He is known for his work on Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), King of Thorn (2009) and Little Witch Academia (2013).
biography.name: Kenji Nomura

biography.bio: Shôgo Suzuki was born on February 4, 1989 in Odawara, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Samurai Squadron Shinkenger (2009) and The Cure (1997).
biography.name: Shôgo Suzuki

biography.bio: Masahiro Kobayashi was born on May 16, 1971 in Hokkaido, Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Godzilla, Mothra and King Ghidorah: Giant Monsters All-Out Attack (2001) and Last Dinner (2013).
biography.name: Masahiro Kobayashi

biography.bio: Kazuyuki Yama is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Dirge of Cerberus: Final Fantasy VII (2006) and Reminiscence of Final Fantasy VII (2005).
biography.name: Kazuyuki Yama

biography.bio: Yumi Kakazu was born on June 18, 1973 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Ayashi no Ceres (2000) and Vandread (2000).
biography.name: Yumi Kakazu

biography.bio: Hideo Ishikawa was born on December 13, 1969 in Amagasaki, Hyogo, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005) and Re: Cutie Honey (2004).
biography.name: Hideo Ishikawa

biography.bio: Masachika Ichimura was born on January 28, 1949 in Japan. He is an actor, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), 13 assassins (2010) and For Love's Sake (2012).
biography.name: Masachika Ichimura

biography.bio: Miyû Tsuzurahara was born on October 30, 1994 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Final Fantasy VII: Advent Children (2005), Ghost in the Shell: Stand Alone Complex (2002) and Beyond (2003).
biography.name: Miyû Tsuzurahara
